energy module¶

MASTER FILE ASSIGNMENT 1 __GROUP11

Farouq El-Abbass Moritz Häckel Dominik Trut Moritz Güttersberger

class energy.Energy(data=None)¶

Bases: object

This class is a model for all the methods introduced to inspect the data set

data¶

Dataframe including the energy data

Type

pandas dataframe

allcountries_scatter(year)¶

This method shows the correlation between emissions, total engery consumption and the population for the year passed in the argument.

Parameters

year (integer) – year you want the chart to display

Returns

px.scatter

Return type

chart

arima_forecast(country, points: int)¶

Method to forecast consumption and emissions for contry passed in argument

Parameters

  • country (str) – Country for forecasting.

  • points (int) – Number of points for forecasting in the future.

Returns

fig – Figure displaying the forecast of consumtion and emissions for the country passed in argument

Return type

matplotlib figure

consumption_area_plot(country, normalize)¶

Returns an area chart of the ‘_consumption’ columns for a selected country

Parameters

  • country (string) – country you want to see the area chart for.

  • normalize (boolean) – normalize the chart or not.

Returns

area_chart

Return type

chart

consumption_country(countries)¶

The method produces a dataframe with defined countries in columns and all years in rows. Values are the sum of the total energy consumption of the country.

Parameters

countries (list of strings) – A list of countries that are included in the consumption per country dataframe

Returns

Displays the bar plot of the total consumption for each country.

Return type

Bar Plot

countries_list()¶

Returns the list of countries in the data

Parameters

None –

Returns

country_list – List of countries in the dataframe

Return type

list

gapminder(year)¶

This method shows the correlation between gpd, total engery consumption and the population for the year passed in the argument.

Parameters

year (integer) – year you want the chart to display

Returns

px.scatter

Return type

chart

gdp_over_years(countries)¶

Receive a string or a list of strings -> Compare the “gdp” column of each received country over the years

Parameters

countries (list of strings) – DESCRIPTION. Name of every country that is included

Returns

gdp_over_years_df –

DESCRIPTION: GPD of countries over the years

columns = Countries index = years

Return type

pandas Dataframe

prepare_df(metric)¶

The method produces a dataframe of all countries and years for one transmitted metric (i.e. GDP or Population).

Parameters

metric (string) – The name of the column from which values are extracted (i.e. “gdp” for values of gdp column).

Returns

metric_df – A dataframe that has all countries in columns and years in rows. Values are the defined metric

Return type

dataframe

read_data(drop_continents: bool = False, url='https://github.com/owid/energy-data/raw/master/owid-energy-data.csv')¶

Downloads the owid data in the ´/downloads´ folder, cleans it, and reads data as well

Parameters

  • url (string) – Link of the data from internet

  • drop_continents (bool) – Drops continents and aggregated countries from dataset

Returns

df – Dataframe of the data including consumption and emissions, cleaned dataset from NAN, with an index of timestamp

Return type

pandas dataframe
